data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bezděk, Jan (2019): Annotated review of Cryptocephalinae (Clytrini), Synetinae and part of Galerucinae (Coleoptera, Chrysomelidae) described by Carl Peter Thunberg. European Journal of Taxonomy 499: 1-42, DOI: https://doi.org/10.5852/ejt.2019.499|58 occurrences
